p: In castor oil-induced diarrhea test, n-hexane fraction showed promising anti-diarrheal effect in mice with diarrheal inhibition of 44.58%. Methanol extract at dose of 200 and 400 mg/kg body weight moderately inhibited the frequency of defecation (30.80% and 44.42%) when compared with untreated control mice (p<0.05). (Table 7).
